title: No. 13/10 Virginia Tech set to open 2022 season with three ranked opponents - VT hokiesports.com
content: No. 13/10 Virginia Tech set to open 2022 season with three ranked opponents  VT hokiesports.com
description: LEESBURG, Fla. â€“ The Virginia Tech softball team is set to open the 2022 season on Friday, heading down to Florida to compete in the inaugural Northern Lights/Southern Nights Tournament at the Sleepy Hollow Sports Complex in Leesburg. All games will be streamed on FloSoftball.
